content: चारु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (रु|र्वी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [चरति चित्ते चर् उण्, <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Uṇ. 1. 3</ls>] {@--1@} Agreeable, welcome, beloved. esteemed, dear (with <ab>dat.</ab> or <ab>loc.</ab>); वरुणाय or वरुणे चारुः. {@--2@} Pleasing, lovely, beautiful, elegant, pretty; प्रिये चारुशीले मुंच मयि मानमनिदानं <ls>Gīt. 10</ls>; सर्वं प्रिये चारुतरं वसंते <ls>Rs. 6. 2</ls>; चकासतं चारुचमूरुचर्मणा <ls>Śi. 1. 8</ls>; <ls n="Śi.">4. 49.</ls> --रुः An epithet of Bṛhaspati. --रु {%<ab>n.</ab>%} Saffron.
चार्वी {@--1@} A beautiful woman. {@--2@} Moonlight. {@--3@} Intelligence. {@--4@} Splendour, lustre, brilliancy. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of the wife of Kubera.
